original_text: So Joshua and the whole army moved out to attack Ai. He chose thirty thousand of his best fighting men and sent them out at night
korean_text: 이에 여호수아가 일어나서 군사와 함께 아이로 올라가려 하여 용사 삼만 명을 뽑아 밤에 보내며

sentences.original_text: So Joshua and the whole army moved out
He chose thirty thousand of his best fighting men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 최고 전사 삼만 명을 뽑았고

sentences.original_text: and sent them out at night
